      /* Mission Statement Section Styling */
      .mission-statement-container {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        width: 80%;
        max-width: 1100px;
        margin: 0 auto;
      }
      
      .mission-statement-card {
        border: 2px solid  #00883b70;
        border-radius: 15px;
        padding: 1.5rem 2rem;
        background-color: white;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(44, 95, 141, 0.1);
        transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .mission-statement{
        border-radius: 15px;
        padding: 2rem 3rem;
        background-color: #f7fcf7f2;
        
      }
      .mission-statement-card:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(44, 95, 141, 0.15);
      }
      
      .mission-statement h2,
      .activities-container h2,
      .impact-card h2,
      .carousel-section h2 {
        display: block;
        width: fit-content;
        margin: 0 auto 1.5rem auto;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #00883A;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 2px;
        border-bottom: 3px solid #00883b79;
        padding-bottom: 0.3rem;
      }

      
      .mission-statement p {
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        line-height: 1.8;
        color: #333;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 0;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
      }
      .mission-statement-checklist {
        margin-top: 1rem;
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
        gap: 1.5rem 2rem;
        list-style: none;

      }
      .checklist-item {
        font-size: 0.98rem;
        color: #333;
        text-align: justify;
      }

      .mission-statement-checklist li {
        position: relative;
        padding-left: 1.2rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.8rem;
        line-height: 1.7;
      }

      
      .mission-statement-checklist li::marker {
        content: "✓";
        color: #00883A;
        font-size: 1.3rem;
        font-weight: 400;
        text-shadow: 2px 2px 2px #01411d3c;
      }
      .mission-statement .btn {
        display: inline-block;            
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        padding: 0.65rem 1.6rem;         
        font-size: 1.1rem;                 
        font-weight: 500;                
        color: #ffffff;                  
        background-color: #00883A;     
        border: none;                              
        text-decoration: none;             
        transition: all 0.25s ease;       
        cursor: pointer;                  
        box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 136, 58, 0.25); 
      }

      .mission-statement .btn:hover,
      .mission-statement .btn:active,
      .mission-statement .btn:focus{
        background-color: #006b2d !important;       
        box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0, 136, 58, 0.3); 
        transform: translateY(-2px);      
      }

      
      /* Impact Metrics Section Styling */
      .impact-container {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 3rem 0;
        margin-bottom: 3rem;
      }
      
      .impact-card {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 3rem 2rem;
        border: 2px solid #00883b70;
        border-radius: 8px;
        background-color: #f8fafc;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(44, 95, 141, 0.1);
      }
      
      .impact-metrics {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
        gap: 2rem;
      }
      
      .metric {
        text-align: center;
      }
      
      .metric-value {
        font-size: 3.5rem;
        font-weight: 800;
        color: #00883A;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        line-height: 1;
      }
      
      .metric-label {
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: #444;
        line-height: 1.5;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
      }
      /* Activities Section Styling */ 

      .activities-container {
          display: flex;
          flex-wrap: wrap;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 2rem;
          padding: 3rem 1.5rem;
          margin-bottom: 2rem;
          align-items:stretch;
          width: 90%;
          margin-left: auto;
          margin-right: auto;
      }

      .row {
        align-items: stretch; 
      }

      .activities-card {
          background: #00883A;
          color: white;
          border-radius: 16px;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          height: 100%;
          flex: 0 1 calc(33.33% - 1.125rem);
          padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
          box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06),
                      0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
          text-wrap: balance;
          transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease, background 0.3s ease;
      }
      .activities-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-2px) scale(1.02);
        box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08), 0 6px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
  
      }
      
      .activities-card p {
          margin-top: 0;
          font-size: 1.05rem;
          line-height: 1.7;
          text-align: center;
          margin-bottom: 1rem;
          font-weight: 400;
          flex-grow: 1; 
      }

        .activities-card i {
          font-size: 2.8rem;
          display: inline-flex; 
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          color: inherit;
          margin: 0 auto 0.5rem; 
          background: #ffffff1e;
          border-radius: 50%;
          width: 5rem;  
          height: 5rem;
          padding: 0;  
        }

      .activities-card .btn {
          margin-top: auto; 
          display: inline-block;
          padding: 0.65rem 1.6rem;
          border: none;
          border-radius: 999px;
          background: white;
          color: #00883A;
          font-size: 1rem;
          font-weight: 600;
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: all 0.25s ease;
          align-self: center;
          width: fit-content;
        }

      .activities-card .btn:hover,
      .activities-card .btn:active,
      .activities-card .btn:focus{
        background: #eeededfb !important;
        color: #006f2d !important;
        transform: translateY(-2px);
      }

      /* Testimonial Section Styling */

      .testimonial-grid {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 2.5rem;
        max-width: 900px;
        margin: 0 auto;
      }

      .testimonial-image img {
        width: 180px;
        aspect-ratio: 1 / 1;
        object-fit: cover;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: block;
      }
      .testimonial-content blockquote {
        border-left: 4px solid #00883b2b;
      }
      .testimonial-content blockquote p{
        margin: 0;
        font-style: italic;
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        line-height: 1.6;
        color: #414141ff;
      }

      .testimonial-content strong {
        display: block;
        margin-top: 1.25rem;
        font-size: 1.15rem;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #000;
      }

      /* Newsletter Section Styling */

      .newsletter-section {
        background-color: #a6c871;
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin: 1.5rem 0;
      }
 
      .newsletter-grid {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 3rem;
        max-width: 900px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        justify-content: center; 
        padding: 2rem 1rem; 

      }

      .newsletter-grid .newsletter-icon i{
        font-size: 5rem;
        margin:0;
        color: white; 
      }


      .newsletter-grid .newsletter-content strong {
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 1.8rem;
        margin:0;
        color: white;
      }

      .newsletter-content p {
        font-size: 1.23rem;
        line-height: 1.5;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        color: white;
        margin: 0.5rem 0 1rem 0;
      }

      .newsletter-content .btn {
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 0.65rem 1.6rem;
        border-radius: 0.5rem;
        background-color: #ffffff28;
        border: 2px solid white;
        color: white;
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        font-weight: 500;  
        transition: all 0.25s ease;       
        cursor: pointer;                        
      }

      .newsletter-content .btn:hover,
      .newsletter-content .btn:active,
      .newsletter-content .btn:focus{
        transform: translateY(-2px);
        background: #ffffff50 !important;
        color:white !important;
        border: 2px solid white;
      }
      @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .testimonial-grid {
          flex-direction: column;
          text-align: center;
        }
        .newsletter-grid {
          display: flex;
          flex-wrap: wrap;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 1rem;

        }
        .newsletter-grid .newsletter-content strong {
          font-weight: 600;
          font-size: 1.5rem;
        }
          .activities-card {
            flex: 1 1 100%;
            max-width: 90%;
            gap: 1rem;
          }

      }

## Mission Statement

The interdisciplinary LMU Open Science Center (OSC) is a researcher-led initiative supporting LMU Munich by embedding open, responsible, and reproducible practices at the core of research excellence.

::: {.mission-statement-checklist}

::: {.checklist-item}
- Essential training in the highest standards of reproducible research methods
- Digital sovereignty and resilience to global challenges through open source workflows
:::

::: {.checklist-item}
- Transparency as foundation for trust and evidence-based societal debates
- Reliable scientific data as a critical foundation for responsible AI, digitalisation, and societal translation
::: 
:::
[Learn More](about/index.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::
